othmane_riad.name: Riad Dar Othmane
othmane_riad.location: Old Medina, near Bab Mansour. The main gate closes at midnight.
othmane_riad.breakfast_info: Served every day from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM on the patio. It includes Moroccan pancakes (Baghrir), local honey, fresh orange juice, and mint tea. Please inform the manager one day prior for early breakfast.
othmane_riad.wifi_info: The WiFi network is 'Othmane_Guest', and the password is 'RiadMeknes24'. The signal is strongest on the ground floor.
othmane_riad.tours_info: We offer a Camel Trek (300dh per person for 2 hours) and a 4x4 Desert Tour to Erg Chebbi (800dh per car, 4 people max). For bookings, contact the manager via the WhatsApp number. No prepayment needed for tours.

khadija_riad.name: Riad Khadija Merzouga
khadija_riad.location: Near the big Dunes of Erg Chebbi. Free parking is available right outside the riad.
khadija_riad.breakfast_info: Served from 7:00 AM to 9:00 AM in the main tent. It includes Amlou, fresh bread, and Moroccan tea. Lunch and dinner can be ordered until 5 PM.
khadija_riad.wifi_info: The network is 'Desert_Wifi', and the password is 'SaharaStar'. The connection can be weak during sandstorms.
khadija_riad.tours_info: Our popular tours are Sunset Quad Biking (400dh per quad) and the Overnight Desert Camp (600dh per person, dinner included). We also arrange transfers to Marrakech (700dh per person).

riad_client_3.name: Riad Lalla Fatima
riad_client_3.location: In the Essaouira Kasbah, 5 minutes walk from the port.
riad_client_3.breakfast_info: Available à la carte from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Free for guests.
riad_client_3.tours_info: We offer kite surfing lessons (450dh per hour) and horse riding on the beach (200dh).
